Home

C/C++/OpenGL

Home is a multithreaded radioplay for the desktop.

Here

iOS

Here is an interactive story merging writing, sound, photography, and film into a single experience. Here is a story about a man realizing that he is god. Chapters are radio plays that represent the path that the characters are taking.

String Theory

Max MSP

String is controller used to generate waveforms, curves, and envelopes using a camera, coloured string, and Max/MSP.

Atlas Sound
